PE_TradeRequest2.questDescriptionRules.r.li:
questDescription->[faction_name]'s researchers are convinced that the secret to the Phoenix lies in the seemingly magical [requestedThing_label] contained within each Ash Trooper.

By studying a captured phoenix, one might learn of a way to extract the [requestedThing_label] without destroying it. Be warned, even with the required knowledge it is still a dangerous process. 

Help the research effort by delivering [requestedThingCount]x [requestedThing_label]s to [settlement_label]. 

The estimated travel time is [estimatedTravelTime_duration].
